Package org.ginsim.gui.graph

Class BaseGraphGUI<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.gui.graph.BaseGraphGUI<G,​V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the graph
    V - the vertex
    E - the edge
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SavingGUI, GraphListener<G>, GraphViewListener, GraphGUI<G,​V,​E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CanvasGraphGUIImpl
    public abstract class BaseGraphGUI<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>
extends Object
implements GraphGUI<G,​V,​E>, GraphViewListener, GraphListener<G>
    Abstract class providing generic parts of a Graph GUI.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi
